vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Benjamin living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Ch.8.20;
son of: Shimei (H8096N);
brother of: Jakim (H3356), Zichri (H2147H), Zabdi (H2067H), Elienai (H0462), Eliel (H0447H), Adaiah (H5718H), Beraiah (H1256) and Shimrath (H8119)
§ Zilthai = "dark"
1) a Benjamite of the sons of Shimhi
2) a Manassite and commander of thousands who came to David at Ziklag
vocabinfos._es_Definition: (a)   hijo de Simí; jefe de familia; tribu de Benjamín; (b)   oficial; tribu de Manasés; en tiempos del rey David
vocabinfos._zh_tw_Definition:
洗勒太 这个陽性專有名詞 人名在原文的意思是 "黑暗"
1) 便雅憫人示每的兒子之一 (代上 8:20)
2) 在洗革拉投入大衛麾下的一位瑪拿西的千夫長 (代上 12:20)
vocabinfos._zh_Definition:
洗勒太 这个阳性专有名词 人名在原文的意思是 "黑暗"
1) 便雅悯人示每的儿子之一 (代上 8:20)
2) 在洗革拉投入大卫麾下的一位玛拿西的千夫长 (代上 12:20)

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Ch.12.20
§ Zilthai = "dark"
1) a Benjamite of the sons of Shimhi
2) a Manassite and commander of thousands who came to David at Ziklag
